page.title: 17Metal Box PLC Carlisle (i)
page.content: There are two Metal Box factories in Carlisle, both in our survey area: {Botcherby "Open Top"}plant employing 750 in the manufacture of beer, soft drinks and processed food cans at 400 cans per minute. {James Street}employing 654 (including 81 temporary staff) in the design and manufacture of decorative boxes, sweet tins, cigar & tobacco tins, talc cont- ainers, oil & chemical drums, bottle tops, aerosol spray cans, and printed metal trays. {Metal Box}is now a multinational corp- oration with branches in Australia, New Zealand, India, Israel, Canada, the USA, and six European countries, but the firm began in 1799 in Carlisle as{Hudson Scott & Sons Ltd.}In June 1985 132 jobs were shed at James St. and more are to go at Botcherby when plastic bottle caps come on line.
